```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```


# About lua filters

Since pandoc 2.0, it is possible to use lua filters to add some extra functionality to pandoc document conversion. Adding a pagebreak command in markdown to be compatible with several output document is one of them. You can find some more informations about lua filters in [pandoc's documentation](https://pandoc.org/lua-filters.html) and also [a collection of lua filters for pandoc](https://github.com/pandoc/lua-filters) you can use in your Rmarkdown document
